aka: Tayo the Little Bus Movie: Rescue My Friend Ace
trans_title: 泰路可爱小巴士：拯救王牌大作战
Tayo the Little Bus Movie: Rescue My Friend Ace
introduction: Ace, who was separated from Doori, wanders into the land of abandoned toys. Tayo and his friends also are drifted into the Land of Toys, while they search around to find Ace. Shortly after they found Ace there, they now are chased down by the Queen of the Land of Toys. Will Tayo and his friends be able to beat the Queen and rescue Ace from her?
chinese_title: 泰路可爱小巴士：拯救王牌大作战
